name: SendResume Portal Services
overview:
SendResume is Indiaâ€™s No. 1 list of placement consultants. It acts as an information highway between leading consultants across the country and active job seekers across all industry background and experience parameters.

SendResume functions with the single point objective and philosophy that your Resume should be at the Right place at the Right time. Approx. 80% of leading corporate houses are today outsourcing the core recruitment activities to specialized recruitment houses i.e. the placement consultants, hence reaching out to these consultants to the maximum should be the foremost aim of any serious job seeker. SendResume.in helps reach-out to these consultants in the most efficient and cost effective way.

SendResume the outcome of quality R&D carried out by Invisitech India Private limited i.e. the parent company, into the recruitment industry and the hiring life-cycle in the Indian scenario. It not only helps active Job-seekers reach-out consultants as per their geographic preferences etc, but also helps leading consultants get a FREE access of quality resume inflow which is the lifeline of their whole foundation.

For details present at www.sendresume.in
